name: Jump Kill Destroy 2
description:
You don't know what Jump Kill Destroy is?

Let me explain it for you.

  • Jump means that you can jump
  • Kill means that you can kill someone
  • Destroy means that you can destroy something.

Pretty simple, huh?

So, there are 7 levels that you have to pass to get to the end. Of course you can go to level menu and get to last level from start. But you won't do that, right?

I started making this game in the middle of July, so if we use complex math formulas we can find out what i was making this game for about half a year.

I hope you'll like it. Thanks for reading.
